message.content:
The most likely category for this book would be "Arts, Crafts & Sewing" because it is a book about sewing. 

The second likely category would be "Books" because it is a book.

The third likely category would be "Toys & Games" because it is a book that teaches children to sew.

The fourth likely category would be "Home & Kitchen" because sewing can be considered a home activity.

The fifth likely category would be "Office Products" because sewing can also be considered a craft or hobby.

Title: My First Machine Sewing Book: Straight Stitching (My First Sewing Book Kit series)
Content: Winky Cherryhas been teaching children to sew for more than 30 years. She is the author of the My First Sewing Kits series. She lives in Mill Valley, California.--This text refers to an alternatePaperbackedition....
